translation.start_1.narration: Hey yo, my friends... I'm Alexa. I'm the Amazon’s cloud-based voice service. you know? Artificial intelligent! You! Don't make that face, I know I'm cool and fantastic and ... beautiful.
translation.start_1_1.narration: I bring you a huge business from a fantastic client. Amazing, right?. I know I am genius! But before that, let me know who you are. Let's do...from you, the girl on the left!
translation.start_1_1_1.narration: Ahh.. you have a good team. There you go! Take your business and work hard. Let me know your process. Busy gotta go bye!
translation.start_1_1_1_1.narration: Remember! Shippable! You need to publish it to amazon alexa store!
translation.start_1_1_1_1_1.narration: Amazon echo is my flagship smart speaker. You are talking to me through it right now! You, idiot!
translation.start_1_1_1_1_1_1.narration: What career? What character? Can I make Lily a 80 year-old lady, learn wingsuit fly, and then win the world champion?
translation.start_1_1_1_1_1_1_1.narration: But I do like the generating character part. It sounds like sim ish.
translation.start_1_1_1_1_1_1_1_1.narration: Cool, has potential. But attaching only to environments?
translation.start_1_1_1_1_1_1_1_1_1.narration: How many people are there in the market have smart home light bulb? You want my client to lose potential players? Think smart! Abandon this idea!
translation.Quarters.narration: You know I can't play audio clip longer than 4 minutes, right?
translation.Prototype1.narration: Warning warning, don’t expose my secret to outsiders. Say it out with me: Alexa has no emotions.
